attributes.action: Ensure Local Authorities maintain Road Crossing Patrols for schools
attributes.additional_details: What price can we put on a child's safety?
attributes.background: Norfolk County Council are trying to cut certain school crossing patrols from operating, because they deem they do not meet certain threshold criteria and are therefore not necessary. It is another cost-cutting motion, which will see lives of pupils and parents crossing the road put at higher risk.
